speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: ACT II

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: SCENE I. Another part of the island.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO, ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Beseech you, sir, be merry; you have cause,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: So have we all, of joy; for our escape

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Is much beyond our loss. Our hint of woe

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Is common; every day some sailor's wife,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: The masters of some merchant and the merchant

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Have just our theme of woe; but for the miracle,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I mean our preservation, few in millions

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Can speak like us: then wisely, good sir, weigh

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Our sorrow with our comfort.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Prithee, peace.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: He receives comfort like cold porridge.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The visitor will not give him o'er so.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Look he's winding up the watch of his wit;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: by and by it will strike.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Sir,--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: One: tell.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: When every grief is entertain'd that's offer'd,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Comes to the entertainer--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: A dollar.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Dolour comes to him, indeed: you

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: have spoken truer than you purposed.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: You have taken it wiselier than I meant you should.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Therefore, my lord,--

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Fie, what a spendthrift is he of his tongue!

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I prithee, spare.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Well, I have done: but yet,--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: He will be talking.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Which, of he or Adrian, for a good

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: wager, first begins to crow?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: The old cock.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The cockerel.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Done. The wager?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: A laughter.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: A match!

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Though this island seem to be desert,--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Ha, ha, ha! So, you're paid.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Uninhabitable and almost inaccessible,--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Yet,--

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Yet,--

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: He could not miss't.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: It must needs be of subtle, tender and delicate

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: temperance.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Temperance was a delicate wench.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Ay, and a subtle; as he most learnedly delivered.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: The air breathes upon us here most sweetly.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: As if it had lungs and rotten ones.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Or as 'twere perfumed by a fen.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Here is everything advantageous to life.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: True; save means to live.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Of that there's none, or little.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: How lush and lusty the grass looks! how green!

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The ground indeed is tawny.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: With an eye of green in't.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: He misses not much.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: No; he doth but mistake the truth totally.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: But the rarity of it is,--which is indeed almost

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: beyond credit,--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: As many vouched rarities are.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: That our garments, being, as they were, drenched in

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: the sea, hold notwithstanding their freshness and

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: glosses, being rather new-dyed than stained with

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: salt water.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: If but one of his pockets could speak, would it not

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: say he lies?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Ay, or very falsely pocket up his report

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Methinks our garments are now as fresh as when we

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: put them on first in Afric, at the marriage of

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: the king's fair daughter Claribel to the King of Tunis.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: 'Twas a sweet marriage, and we prosper well in our return.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Tunis was never graced before with such a paragon to

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: their queen.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Not since widow Dido's time.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Widow! a pox o' that! How came that widow in?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: widow Dido!

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: What if he had said 'widower AEneas' too? Good Lord,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: how you take it!

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: 'Widow Dido' said you? you make me study of that:

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: she was of Carthage, not of Tunis.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: This Tunis, sir, was Carthage.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Carthage?

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I assure you, Carthage.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: His word is more than the miraculous harp; he hath

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: raised the wall and houses too.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: What impossible matter will he make easy next?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I think he will carry this island home in his pocket

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: and give it his son for an apple.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And, sowing the kernels of it in the sea, bring

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: forth more islands.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Ay.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Why, in good time.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Sir, we were talking that our garments seem now

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: as fresh as when we were at Tunis at the marriage

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: of your daughter, who is now queen.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And the rarest that e'er came there.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Bate, I beseech you, widow Dido.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: O, widow Dido! ay, widow Dido.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Is not, sir, my doublet as fresh as the first day I

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: wore it? I mean, in a sort.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: That sort was well fished for.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: When I wore it at your daughter's marriage?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: You cram these words into mine ears against

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: The stomach of my sense. Would I had never

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Married my daughter there! for, coming thence,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: My son is lost and, in my rate, she too,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Who is so far from Italy removed

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I ne'er again shall see her. O thou mine heir

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Of Naples and of Milan, what strange fish

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Hath made his meal on thee?

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: Sir, he may live:

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: I saw him beat the surges under him,

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: And ride upon their backs; he trod the water,

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: Whose enmity he flung aside, and breasted

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: The surge most swoln that met him; his bold head

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: 'Bove the contentious waves he kept, and oar'd

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: Himself with his good arms in lusty stroke

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: To the shore, that o'er his wave-worn basis bow'd,

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: As stooping to relieve him: I not doubt

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: He came alive to land.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: No, no, he's gone.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Sir, you may thank yourself for this great loss,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: That would not bless our Europe with your daughter,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: But rather lose her to an African;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Where she at least is banish'd from your eye,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Who hath cause to wet the grief on't.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Prithee, peace.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: You were kneel'd to and importuned otherwise

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: By all of us, and the fair soul herself

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Weigh'd between loathness and obedience, at

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Which end o' the beam should bow. We have lost your

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: son,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I fear, for ever: Milan and Naples have

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: More widows in them of this business' making

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Than we bring men to comfort them:

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: The fault's your own.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: So is the dear'st o' the loss.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: My lord Sebastian,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: The truth you speak doth lack some gentleness

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And time to speak it in: you rub the sore,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: When you should bring the plaster.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Very well.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And most chirurgeonly.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: It is foul weather in us all, good sir,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: When you are cloudy.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Foul weather?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Very foul.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Had I plantation of this isle, my lord,--

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: He'ld sow't with nettle-seed.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Or docks, or mallows.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And were the king on't, what would I do?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: 'Scape being drunk for want of wine.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I' the commonwealth I would by contraries

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Execute all things; for no kind of traffic

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Would I admit; no name of magistrate;

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Letters should not be known; riches, poverty,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And use of service, none; contract, succession,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Bourn, bound of land, tilth, vineyard, none;

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: No use of metal, corn, or wine, or oil;

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: No occupation; all men idle, all;

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And women too, but innocent and pure;

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: No sovereignty;--

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Yet he would be king on't.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The latter end of his commonwealth forgets the

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: beginning.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: All things in common nature should produce

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Without sweat or endeavour: treason, felony,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Sword, pike, knife, gun, or need of any engine,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Would I not have; but nature should bring forth,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Of its own kind, all foison, all abundance,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: To feed my innocent people.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: No marrying 'mong his subjects?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: None, man; all idle: whores and knaves.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I would with such perfection govern, sir,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: To excel the golden age.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: God save his majesty!

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Long live Gonzalo!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And,--do you mark me, sir?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Prithee, no more: thou dost talk nothing to me.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I do well believe your highness; and

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: did it to minister occasion to these gentlemen,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: who are of such sensible and nimble lungs that

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: they always use to laugh at nothing.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: 'Twas you we laughed at.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Who in this kind of merry fooling am nothing

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: to you: so you may continue and laugh at

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: nothing still.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: What a blow was there given!

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: An it had not fallen flat-long.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: You are gentlemen of brave metal; you would lift

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: the moon out of her sphere, if she would continue

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: in it five weeks without changing.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Enter ARIEL, invisible, playing solemn music

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: We would so, and then go a bat-fowling.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Nay, good my lord, be not angry.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: No, I warrant you; I will not adventure

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: my discretion so weakly. Will you laugh

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: me asleep, for I am very heavy?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Go sleep, and hear us.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: All sleep except ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, and ANTONIO

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: What, all so soon asleep! I wish mine eyes

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Would, with themselves, shut up my thoughts: I find

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: They are inclined to do so.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Please you, sir,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Do not omit the heavy offer of it:

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: It seldom visits sorrow; when it doth,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: It is a comforter.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: We two, my lord,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Will guard your person while you take your rest,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And watch your safety.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Thank you. Wondrous heavy.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: ALONSO sleeps. Exit ARIEL

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: What a strange drowsiness possesses them!

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: It is the quality o' the climate.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Why

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Doth it not then our eyelids sink? I find not

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Myself disposed to sleep.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Nor I; my spirits are nimble.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: They fell together all, as by consent;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: They dropp'd, as by a thunder-stroke. What might,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Worthy Sebastian? O, what might?--No more:--

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And yet me thinks I see it in thy face,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: What thou shouldst be: the occasion speaks thee, and

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: My strong imagination sees a crown

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Dropping upon thy head.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: What, art thou waking?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Do you not hear me speak?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I do; and surely

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: It is a sleepy language and thou speak'st

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Out of thy sleep. What is it thou didst say?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: This is a strange repose, to be asleep

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: With eyes wide open; standing, speaking, moving,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: And yet so fast asleep.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Noble Sebastian,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Thou let'st thy fortune sleep--die, rather; wink'st

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Whiles thou art waking.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Thou dost snore distinctly;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: There's meaning in thy snores.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I am more serious than my custom: you

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Must be so too, if heed me; which to do

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Trebles thee o'er.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Well, I am standing water.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I'll teach you how to flow.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Do so: to ebb

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Hereditary sloth instructs me.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: O,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: If you but knew how you the purpose cherish

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Whiles thus you mock it! how, in stripping it,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: You more invest it! Ebbing men, indeed,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Most often do so near the bottom run

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: By their own fear or sloth.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Prithee, say on:

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: The setting of thine eye and cheek proclaim

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: A matter from thee, and a birth indeed

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Which throes thee much to yield.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Thus, sir:

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Although this lord of weak remembrance, this,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Who shall be of as little memory

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: When he is earth'd, hath here almost persuade,--

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: For he's a spirit of persuasion, only

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Professes to persuade,--the king his son's alive,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: 'Tis as impossible that he's undrown'd

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And he that sleeps here swims.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I have no hope

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: That he's undrown'd.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: O, out of that 'no hope'

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: What great hope have you! no hope that way is

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Another way so high a hope that even

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Ambition cannot pierce a wink beyond,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: But doubt discovery there. Will you grant with me

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: That Ferdinand is drown'd?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: He's gone.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Then, tell me,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Who's the next heir of Naples?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Claribel.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: She that is queen of Tunis; she that dwells

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Ten leagues beyond man's life; she that from Naples

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Can have no note, unless the sun were post--

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The man i' the moon's too slow--till new-born chins

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Be rough and razorable; she that--from whom?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: We all were sea-swallow'd, though some cast again,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And by that destiny to perform an act

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Whereof what's past is prologue, what to come

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: In yours and my discharge.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: What stuff is this! how say you?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: 'Tis true, my brother's daughter's queen of Tunis;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: So is she heir of Naples; 'twixt which regions

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: There is some space.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: A space whose every cubit

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Seems to cry out, 'How shall that Claribel

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Measure us back to Naples? Keep in Tunis,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And let Sebastian wake.' Say, this were death

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: That now hath seized them; why, they were no worse

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Than now they are. There be that can rule Naples

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: As well as he that sleeps; lords that can prate

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: As amply and unnecessarily

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: As this Gonzalo; I myself could make

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: A chough of as deep chat. O, that you bore

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The mind that I do! what a sleep were this

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: For your advancement! Do you understand me?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Methinks I do.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And how does your content

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Tender your own good fortune?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I remember

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: You did supplant your brother Prospero.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: True:

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And look how well my garments sit upon me;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Much feater than before: my brother's servants

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Were then my fellows; now they are my men.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: But, for your conscience?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Ay, sir; where lies that? if 'twere a kibe,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: 'Twould put me to my slipper: but I feel not

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: This deity in my bosom: twenty consciences,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: That stand 'twixt me and Milan, candied be they

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And melt ere they molest! Here lies your brother,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: No better than the earth he lies upon,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: If he were that which now he's like, that's dead;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Whom I, with this obedient steel, three inches of it,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Can lay to bed for ever; whiles you, doing thus,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: To the perpetual wink for aye might put

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: This ancient morsel, this Sir Prudence, who

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Should not upbraid our course. For all the rest,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: They'll take suggestion as a cat laps milk;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: They'll tell the clock to any business that

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: We say befits the hour.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Thy case, dear friend,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Shall be my precedent; as thou got'st Milan,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I'll come by Naples. Draw thy sword: one stroke

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Shall free thee from the tribute which thou payest;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: And I the king shall love thee.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Draw together;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And when I rear my hand, do you the like,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: To fall it on Gonzalo.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: O, but one word.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: They talk apart

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Re-enter ARIEL, invisible

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: My master through his art foresees the danger

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: That you, his friend, are in; and sends me forth--

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: For else his project dies--to keep them living.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Sings in GONZALO's ear

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: While you here do snoring lie,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Open-eyed conspiracy

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: His time doth take.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: If of life you keep a care,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Shake off slumber, and beware:

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Awake, awake!

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Then let us both be sudden.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Now, good angels

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Preserve the king.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: They wake

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Why, how now? ho, awake! Why are you drawn?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Wherefore this ghastly looking?

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: What's the matter?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Whiles we stood here securing your repose,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Even now, we heard a hollow burst of bellowing

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Like bulls, or rather lions: did't not wake you?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: It struck mine ear most terribly.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I heard nothing.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: O, 'twas a din to fright a monster's ear,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: To make an earthquake! sure, it was the roar

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Of a whole herd of lions.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Heard you this, Gonzalo?

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Upon mine honour, sir, I heard a humming,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And that a strange one too, which did awake me:

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I shaked you, sir, and cried: as mine eyes open'd,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I saw their weapons drawn: there was a noise,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: That's verily. 'Tis best we stand upon our guard,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Or that we quit this place; let's draw our weapons.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Lead off this ground; and let's make further search

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: For my poor son.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Heavens keep him from these beasts!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: For he is, sure, i' the island.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Lead away.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Prospero my lord shall know what I have done:

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: So, king, go safely on to seek thy son.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Exeunt
